meanings.definition: The quality or state of being fluky.
meanings.sent1: Her flukinesses in finding four-leaf clovers amazed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The flukinesses of winning the lottery made him a millionaire overnight.
meanings.sent3: His flukinesses in always picking the shortest line at the grocery store was both lucky and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The flukinesses of the weather patterns created a beautiful rainbow after the storm.
meanings.sent5: The flukinesses of the situation made it seem like magic was at play.

meanings.definition: The occurrence of something by chance or luck.
meanings.sent1: The flukinesses of meeting her childhood friend at the airport was a pleasant surprise.
meanings.sent2: He attributed his success to the flukinesses of being in the right place at the right time.
meanings.sent3: The flukinesses of finding a dollar bill on the sidewalk brightened his day.
meanings.sent4: The flukinesses of life sometimes bring unexpected opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The flukinesses of the situation turned a regular day into a memorable one.
